metadata.title: Earn from YouTube Without Doing Anything! | AI Automated Video Uploads
metadata.description: Did you know you can earn ₹10,000–₹50,000 per month using AI to automatically create and upload videos in your language to YouTube? Learn how in this video!

scenes.text: Do you know you can create and upload YouTube videos in languages like Hindi, Telugu, Tamil — without doing anything manually?
scenes.subtitle: Do you know you can create and upload YouTube videos in Hindi, Telugu, Tamil — without doing anything manually?

scenes.text: With our AI automation, you can generate videos with voiceovers, subtitles, and thumbnails. It even schedules and uploads your content automatically in your YouTube channel!
scenes.subtitle: AI automation even schedules and uploads your videos to your YouTube channel!

scenes.text: Start earning ten thousand to fifty thousand rupees every month, just by letting AI do all the work.
scenes.subtitle: Start earning ₹10,000 to ₹50,000 per month — let AI do the work!

scenes.text: All you need is just enjoy while earning! Our AI will take care of everything — content, voice, visuals, and uploads.
scenes.subtitle: Just enjoy while earning — AI handles content, voice, and uploads!

scenes.text: Want to try it for free? Message us now and get your first AI YouTube video in your own language!
scenes.subtitle: Try it free — your first AI video in your own language!
